name: Mini Festive Matte Lipstick Gift Set
about: What it is:A set featuring three mini lipsticks with a lightweight formula and vibrant, high-impact color...What Else You Need to Know:Share love and celebrate the festive season with this Gucci gift set for women. The set features three lipsticks with a lightweight formula saturated with pigments for vibrant, high-impact color that doesn't smudge or run and is comfortable to wear..This Set Contains:
ingredients: 208 They Met In Argentina: .Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Polysilicone-11, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Nylon-12, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg-12 Dimethicone Beeswax, Dicalcium Phosphate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Mica, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Laureth-12, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Tin Oxide, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)]. ..505 Janet Rust: .Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Polysilicone-11, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Nylon-12, Dicalcium Phosphate, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg-12 Dimethicone Beeswax, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Mica, Parfum/Fragrance, Laureth-12, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Tin Oxide, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)]. ..25 Goldie Red: .Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Polysilicone-11, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Nylon-12, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg-12 Dimethicone Beeswax, Dicalcium Phosphate, Mica, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Laureth-12, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Tin Oxide, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start by lining the lips with the Gucci Crayon Contour des Lu00e8vres lip liner pencil (sold separately). .-Apply the lipstick using the precise edge of the bullet to contour the lips. .-This lipstick can also be applied on the cheeks as a blush.

reviews.review_title: Smaller than micro! Should be a sephora sample
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WTHHH ! This was a gift and i was sooooo embarrassed when i opened the box, i was going to complain saying i just received samples and then i noticed this product was actually there. Its literally smaller than the samples. Wowwww, thank goodness i did not ship this directly to the birthday girls home. I have never been more disappointed in a purchase. $45??? CRAZY. DEFINITELY RETURNING ASAP.

reviews.review_text: Do not get!  This are so tiny  The set is not worth the price. These should be given as samples .
